### Introduction

**[Luvit](https://luvit.io)** is Asynchronous I/O for Lua

### Installation

Visit [releases](./releases/latest) page to download auto-installer!

### History

The first non-beta and non-public version of language has been made in 27 day of March in 2023 year.
